com.anji.neat

Class MutationOperatorMultiple

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgapcustomised.MutationOperator
      • com.anji.neat.MutationOperatorMultiple
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddConnectionMutationOperator, AddNeuronAnywhereMutationOperator, AddNeuronMutationOperator

    public abstract class MutationOperatorMultiple
extends MutationOperator

    For mutation operators that may perform one or potentially more mutations (if the mutation rate is > 1) based solely on the mutation rate (rather than some notion of the number of opportunities for mutation in a given individual).
